Name: KIWAYA
About the game: KIWAYA is a unique action weapon testing-game. Start on ground level and go underground. Your goal is to reach the target within the given time. Every day you receive a new weapon and a new mission. Destroy rocks & bugs, get as deep as possible and receive advice from a penguin. Features - Create your own underground path. - Several different weapons. - 3 game modes. - Game controller support. - Achievements. - There are no ads or in-app purchases. - No data collected on gameplay/behaviour tracking. Play time Story Mode: 30-40 minutes. Journey Mode: no time limit. Orb Mode: challenging arcade mode (1-10 minutes) Accessibility info - All dialogue is written in game. - Text size is big - Use keyboard & mouse or gamepad. - Buttons can be remapped.
